评论概述: Love these beautiful bold pattern pants!

I'm 5'3" with a 29inch inseam, the description said 26 1/2 inseam I thought this would be above the ankle but they are on the floor, the inseam was 31 inches. They have to go back and I'm really sad about that.

Loved them.  Ordered a second pair after the first order.  Material appears to be of good quality.  Stretchy.  I am apple shaped and have trouble finding clothes to fit around my middle.  These stretched enough to fit me and still be comfortable.  Colors are bright and pretty.  Only issue is I am 5'2 so have to hem pants 3 inches, a common problem for me.  Otherwise, am really happy with my purchase.

I'm 5'9, and I figured the 2x (even though they fit a little bigger, so short people can size down) would be best because they say the length is 40". All three of the new pants that I bought hit at different spots. One pair was at the top of my foot, one pair was above that, and one pair fit even shorter. 评论概述: Nice fit but fabric is slinky

The extreme width of the palazzo leg is amazing; they swing well when you walk, and although a little too long to wear without heels, they look better with them anyway.  The fabric, though, is a little "slinky" in that it is a little too shiny and a little too stretchy. Overall, though, they are a keeper.
